title: The Sacred Banquet
itunes:title: The Sacred Banquet
description: One of the most powerful and enduring symbols of God's intention toward the world is the sacred banquet. God wants his life to flow into us and through us to one another. The result of this is life and life to the full. The question posed by the Gospel is this: when the invitation to this banquet comes, do we answer yes or no?

itunes:author: Bishop Robert Barron
